Pointing osu!macOS Agent to your osu! install location¶

This article is applicable to anyone who uses Technocoder’s osu!macOS Agent program.

To point osu!macOS Agent to your osu! install location:

  1. Open osu!macOS Agent

  2. In the Location field, point to the location of your osu! install.

Tip

Your install location should be pointed towards osu!.app. For example, my install location is Users/Adrian/Desktop/osu!.app (you shouldn’t need to escape the exclamation mark)

You should now be ready to get started with osu!macOS Agent.

If that didn’t work¶

Please make a post on the osu!macOS Agent forum thread.
